itemTooltip.envowed.contract1: Use this item to sign this contract.
itemTooltip.envowed.contract2: Signing this contract will temporarily bind your soul to it.
itemTooltip.envowed.contract3: This allows you to empower yourself, at a cost.
itemTooltip.envowed.signedContract1: Represents a Contract between two people.
itemTooltip.envowed.signedContract2: You are able to see the signatories below.
